a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of population living in multidimensional poverty
Multidimensional poverty is defined as being deprived in a range of health, education and living standards
Data source: Alkire, Kanagaratnam and Suppa (2024) - The Global Multidimensional Poverty Index (MPI) 2024
Note: Estimates based on the most recent household survey data (between 2011 and 2023). A separate dataset is produced to monitor
